As we understand the content of what has been provided, we find that the Lord is encouraging them and challenging them to press forward by faith, to continue on, to go on unto perfection, as it says in Hebrews 6. The time is taken to provide a great list of those that have finished their course, finished their race. They ran their race. And then it comes right back to the believers and says, how about us?
